question_text: What result might indicate a short circuit when using a cable tester?
answer_options: All pins light up in order
A single wire shows no continuity
Two pins show a connection that should not be linked
correct_answer: Two pins show a connection that should not be linked
explanation: A short circuit means two conductors are unintentionally connected, and a cable tester will show continuity where there shouldnâ€™t be any.
